Appreciate all the messages after yesterday‚Äôs post. A lot of you shared stories about losing someone early or having to step up sooner than expected.

It‚Äôs a good reminder that most of what drives us isn‚Äôt just money or markets but it‚Äôs the weight of responsibility we carry for the people we care about.

That‚Äôs what makes this all worth it  ü´∂üèº

The one that jumps out is $HOOD at 6.6x PEG (trading at ~73√ó earnings while growing EPS only ~12%).

That looks expensive on paper but it‚Äôs misleading b/c they‚Äôre not focused on squeezing earnings yet.The leverage comes later as they start to monetize the ecosystem they‚Äôre building. Predictive markets is the perfect example of how they can unlock a new profit engine down the line. 

For now they just care about onboarding as many users as possible so the PEG looks high but doesn‚Äôt worry me.

PEG RATIO IS THE MOST SLEPT-ON VALUATION METRIC

PEG < 1 usually means mispriced growth
PEG > 2 is where you start hitting the danger zone

$GOOGL GEMINI‚ÄôS MARKET SHARE HAS DOUBLED IN THE PAST YEAR

Gemini‚Äôs jump to 13.7% vs 6.5% a year ago shows Google‚Äôs distribution moat finally turning into GenAI adoption at scale. Billions of default users in Search, Android & Workspace are being routed straight into Gemini.

OpenAI has to win every user, Google already owns the traffic & is just redirecting it. That‚Äôs the moat & this is the first time we‚Äôve seen that leverage show up in market share data.
I‚Äôm very bullish on $CLPT but it doesn‚Äôt belong on this list. Its edge is MRI-guided precision for neurosurgeons and not AI.

5 WAYS AI IS REBUILDING HEALTHCARE

1. $TEM uses AI on genomic & clinical data to help doctors pick the right therapy for each patient while $BEAM, $NTLA, $PRME, $CRSP & $TWST build the gene-editing/cell-therapy tools that make personalized medicine possible. 

2. AI is moving routine care online so patients get faster access & stay out of hospitals. $HIMS focuses on primary/mental-health visits, $OSCR guides members through benefits and care choices & $TDOC connects patients with doctors/specialists virtually.

3. $ABCL, $RXRX, & $SDGR power genAI drug discovery, running in-silico experiments thousands of times faster than wet labs & cutting development timelines from a decade to just a few years.

4. $ISRG, $RBOT & $MDT lead the AI-assisted surgery shift in operating rooms where robotic platforms guided by computer vision deliver steadier hands, shorter recovery times & fewer complications.

5. $VEEV & $DOCS sit at the core of healthcare‚Äôs data layer, speeding up drug trials for pharma, streamlining workflows for doctors & giving payers the visibility to make smarter decisions.

I lost my dad when I was 19 & had to step up early to support my mom & sister.

One of the greatest lessons he left me with was to make your money work for you & never rely on anyone else for your success. That lesson has guided every step I‚Äôve taken since.

I feel truly blessed that something I love has become my career & now lets me be there for my family in the ways they deserve. I wish I could share this moment over a scotch & a cigar with my dad, but I know he‚Äôd be proud.

The wild thing is $RKLB is one of the few names that‚Äôs already 10x for me but I have no problem adding on dips. 

This name still has so much runway  üëÄ
Feeling truly blessed and grateful for all the messages and support from this community!

THE AI UTILITY TRADE IS JUST GETTING STARTED

$GOOGL, $AMZN, $META, $MSFT & $ORCL are pouring more than $1.2T into build-outs by 2027.

A bottleneck is already forming & companies that turn that demand into usage/cash flow will win big.

Watch $NBIS, $IREN, $CIFR, $CRWV & $GLXY.

My rule of thumb is when a stock is 100%+ above its 200-day, it‚Äôs too extended & needs to base before I step in. 

Every stock comes back to the 200-day eventually. Every single one. No exceptions.
